subtitle: The Minecraft Earth Themed Resource Pack!
description:
This pack aims to port all of the custom mobs and features that are exclusive to Minecraft Earth to Minecraft Java!

Features:
Moobloom
Wooly Cow
Ender Cat
Horned Sheep
Muddy Pig
Cluckshroom
Custom Menu Background
Custom Splashes
Fresh UI
Bone Spider
Jumbo Rabbit
Skeleton Dog
Glow Squid
Tropical Slime
Furnace Golem
Melon Golem
optifine: OptiFine is used to add support for remodelling entities and random entity textures.
